originalText.text: I'm almost hesitant to share this review because I don't want to share Suzi! It's rare to find an expert in holistic health, combining yoga, kinesiology, and myofascial release. She is able to do this because of her extensive study of anatomy and movement over the years. She's truly an expert in movement and the connectedness of the human body. The sessions are fun, challenging, and just make you better (physically, emotionally, and mentally). The world would be a better place if there were more people like Suzi. And we'd all feel better! I feel very lucky to have found her.

originalText.text: Suzi is the the absolute best!!! My mom booked a private Yoga session for my wife and I with her. It was the perfect combination of relaxing and therapeutic with a nice physical workout too. Would definitely recommend if you are wanting a more customized yoga session alongside a knowledgable teacher.

text.text: Suzi is the the absolute best!!! My mom booked a private Yoga session for my wife and I with her. It was the perfect combination of relaxing and therapeutic with a nice physical workout too. Would definitely recommend if you are wanting a more customized yoga session alongside a knowledgable teacher.

originalText.text: I came to see Suzi after wanting to get into a fitness routine following surgery. She listened and helped me with all my goals. We started slowly, gently, and specifically working on my body's strengths and limitations. She taught me so much about how the body works, (i.e. myo-fascial work, anatomy, resistance training & more) and how important it is to use a combination of different tools to achieve all my goals. Thanks to Suzi, I feel fitter and stronger, and I'm also more in touch with my body, the different sensations, and what they mean as well as how to deal with them. We have so much fun during our sessions on top of feeling great! Suzi is fantastic, I cannot recommend her enough.

originalText.text: I've been working with Suzi for a few months, and she's been so helpful already. I work out a lot, and I wanted to round out my regimen with yoga, stretching, etc. I also have a few problem areas (hip, hand) and Suzi is helping a lot to reduce my pain and increase my mobility. I notice a huge difference every day when I'm walking around and working out. She takes the time to explain why she's suggesting different exercises, which I appreciate. I always look forward to my weekly lessons. Thanks, Suzi!

originalText.text: I worked with Suzi for several months and really enjoyed our time together. I've been going through some physical pain issues, and she was able to share her experience and expertise on how to work on my form and strength to really turn my symptoms around. I'm very thankful that I found her and she's been a great teacher throughout the process. I'd highly recommend her!
